Package vrielynckpieterjan.masterproef.apilayer.server.fileserver

Class FileServerRequest

java.lang.Object
vrielynckpieterjan.masterproef.apilayer.server.fileserver.FileServerRequest
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
FileServerReadRequest, FileServerWriteRequest
public abstract class FileServerRequest
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
Abstract class representing a request for the file server part of the APILayer.

    • coveredByPolicy

      public abstract boolean coveredByPolicy​(@NotNull @NotNull RTreePolicy policy)
      Method to check if a user is allowed to perform a certain FileServerRequest, given the access control RTreePolicy of that user for the file server.
      Parameters:
      policy - The RTreePolicy of the user.
      Returns:
      True if the user is allowed to execute the FileServerRequest; false otherwise.
